page.title: 05PETT LEVEL RESCUE BOAT II
page.content: An{emergency situation}registered on Dover Coastguard computer will result in a 999 call to the publican of the {Smuggler}at Pett Level. He telephones members and when a complete crew of three has answered, a klaxon sounds to summon help in the vicinity, for launching. The crew is an interesting sociological cross-section and numbers among its members:- Local builders and Fishermen Barrister Doctor Dungerness Power Station Engineer Telecommunication Engineer Sales Representative Cargo handler at Gatwick Airport Local Shopkeeper Gardener Secretary Two VI th Form schoolboys Summer weekends, vigilance is constant
